Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Lang Fuchs Müller on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Lang Fuchs Müller is a 37 year old Associate from Austria.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Lang Fuchs Müller is currently divorced. He has 2 kids called Fuchs and Tanja.
Education Background:
In 2007, Lang finished his secondary school education at Walser Gymnasium.
Lang earned his degree from IMC University of Applied Sciences Krems in 2011.
Occupation History:
Lang Fuchs Müller is a 37 year old Associate from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Lang Fuchs Müller's first role was as a Analyst at Equity Partners Investment GmbH, where he worked diligently from 2011 to 2012 to establish a strong reputation.
At B&C Private Equity GmbH, he held the position of Associate from 2012 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 120000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns 2 exceptional properties: townhouse located in Wels, valued at approximately 10,000,000.00 EUR, townhouse located in Bruck an der Mur, valued at approximately 880,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases his flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Wels and Bruck an der Mur.
He inherited 5160000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2018, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
